name: Nextoid!
description:
Nextoid! is the NEXT evolution in modern medicine: a nanorobot injected in the body of sick humans, armed with 5 anti-atherosclerosis projectiles.

Guide the robot through 27 arterial blockages and eliminate all signs of plaque.

Gather the hidden bonus substances to arm your robot with new weapons and abilities, but keep an eye on these viruses and their deadly excrements!

Nextoid! is the very first ZX Spectrum NEXT game!

Code, graphics and music by Lampros Potamianos. Level design by Lampros Potamianos and André Luna Leão.

Developed using Zeus assembler, Cspect emulator and a 2A NEXT developers board!
